trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event occurs when a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> is added or removed from a managed collection of such lists.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>就會發生事件時<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>新增或移除受管理集合中的這類清單。

trans-unit.source: This event is not raised when an individual list element changes its value.
trans-unit.target: 個別清單項目變更其值時，不會引發這個事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event is generated by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件由產生<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService>類別時其<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Add%2A>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.Clear%2A>方法會執行。

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the collection.
A value that specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> has been added or removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 值，指定是否已加入 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 或已將其從集合中移除。

trans-unit.source: The collection of list elements after the action has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用動作後的清單項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter will always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件，`relatedObject`參數一律會參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個事件相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 物件集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> that represents the current state of the collection.
The retrieved <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> represents the state of the collection after the event, which involved adding or removing an element, has been applied.
trans-unit.target: 擷取<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>套用涉及新增或移除項目，此事件之後，表示集合的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether an element has been added or removed from the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得旗標，指出是否已加入或從 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 物件的集合中移除項目。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedType" /> that indicates the type of change.

Altering the contents of an existing <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> in the collection will not raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 改變現有的內容<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList>集合中將不會引發<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that that is associated with the collection of <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList" /> 物件集合相關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> associated with the managed <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: 與 Managed <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A>屬性可讓程式設計人員對物件執行個體產生關聯<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A> property should always reference the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType> that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs.RelatedObject%2A>屬性應該一律參考<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=nameWithType>，<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>相關聯。
